= Android Permission中英对照 =

%toc

== Permission中英对照 ==
=== android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows read/write access to the "properties" table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded
允许读写访问 "properties"表在checkin数据库中，改值可以修改上传
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to access coarse (e.g., Cell-ID, WiFi) location
允许一个程序访问CellID或WiFi热点来获取粗略的位置
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to access fine (e.g., GPS) location
允许一个程序访问精良位置(如GPS)
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to access extra location provider commands
允许应用程序访问额外的位置提供命令
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to create mock location providers for testing
允许程序创建模拟位置提供用于测试
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows applications to access information about networks
允许程序访问有关GSM网络信息 
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to use SurfaceFlinger's low level features
允许程序使用SurfaceFlinger底层特性
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks
允许程序访问Wi-Fi 网络状态信息
}}}
 
=== android.permission.ADD_SYSTEM_SERVICE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to publish system-level services
允许程序发布系统级服务
}}}
 
=== android.permission.BATTERY_STATS ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to update the collected battery statistics
允许程序更新手机电池统计信息
}}}

=== android.permission.BLUETOOTH ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices
允许程序连接到已配对的蓝牙设备
}}}
 
=== android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN === 
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices
允许程序发现和配对蓝牙设备
}}}
 
=== android.permission.BRICK ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Required to be able to disable the device (very dangerous!)
请求能够禁用设备(非常危险)
}}}
 
=== android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED === 
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed
允许程序广播一个提示消息在一个应用程序包已经移除后
}}}
 
=== android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents
允许一个程序广播常用 intents
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CALL_PHONE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed
允许一个程序初始化一个电话拨号不需通过拨号 用户界面需要用户确认
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed
允许一个程序拨打任何号码，包含紧 急号码无需通过拨号用户界面需要用户确认
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CAMERA ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Required to be able to access the camera device
请求访问使用照相设备
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not
允 许一个程序是否改变一个组件或其他的启用或禁用
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale
允许一个程序修改当前设置，如本地化
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows applications to change network connectivity state
允许程序改变网络连接状态
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state
允许程序改变Wi-Fi连接状态
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device
允许一个程序清楚缓存从所有安装的程序在设备中
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to clear user data 
允许一个程序清除用户设置
}}}
 
=== android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES ===
{{{class="brush:text"

允许启用禁止位置更新提示从无线模块

=== android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to delete cache files
允许程序删除缓存文件
}}}
 
=== android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to delete packages
允许一个程序删除包
}}}

Allows low-level access to power management
允许访问底层电源管理
}}}
 
=== android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC ===
{{{class="brush:text"

允许程序RW诊断资源
}}}
 
=== android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD ===

=== android.permission.DUMP ===

允许程序返回状态抓取信息从系统服务
}}}
 
=== android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar

}}}
 
=== android.permission.FACTORY_TEST ===

Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user
作为一个工厂测试程序，运行在root用户
}}}
 
=== android.permission.FLASHLIGHT ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows access to the flashlight

}}}
 
=== android.permission.FORCE_BACK ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to force a BACK operation on whatever is the top activity
允许程序强行一个后退操作是否在顶层activities
}}}
 
=== android.permission.FOTA_UPDATE === 
{{{class="brush:text"
暂时不了解这是做什么使用的，Android开发网分析可能是一个预留权限.
}}}
 
=== android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service
访问一个帐户列表在Accounts Service中
}}}
 
=== android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE ===
{{{class="brush:text"

=== android.permission.GET_TASKS ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to get information about the currently or recently running tasks: a thumbnail representation of the tasks, what activities are running in it, etc
允许一个程序获取信息有关当前或最近运行的任 务，一个缩略的任务状态，是否活动等等
}}}
 
=== android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows access to hardware peripherals. 
允许访问硬件
}}}
 
=== android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS ===
{{{class="brush:text"

允许一个程序截获用户事件如按键、触 摸、轨迹球等等到一个时间流
}}}
 
=== android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES ===
{{{class="brush:text"
Allows an application to install packages
允许一个程序安装packages
}}}
 
=== android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW ===

}}}
 
=== android.permission.INTERNET ===

}}}

{{{class="brush:text"

}}}
 
=== android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR ===
{{{class="brush:text"
目前还没有明确的解释，可能是清除一切数据，类似硬格机
}}}
 
=== android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS ===

{{{class="brush:text"
